---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(ggthemes)
```
```{r}
data("congress_age")

congress_age %>%
  mutate(year = format(termstart, "%Y")) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("R", "D")) %>%
  group_by(party, year) %>%
  summarize(avg = mean(age)) %>%
  
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = avg, group = party, color = party)) +
    geom_line() + 
    labs(title = "Average Age of Members of Congress",
         subtitle = "At start of term, 1947-2013",
         source = "538 R Package") +
  theme_fivethirtyeight() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1950, 2010, 10), lim = c(1950, 2010))
```
